text: @NYGovCuomo Andrew, the demand isn’t returning the way we would expect.  Covid19 has changed demand.  It might be more realistic to consider returning the excess difference.  If 70% is able to be rehired then return 30%.  The demand you propose sounds more like something trump would propose
